languages.text: "Ваша Светлость..." {n}Рета на секунду запинается, словно смутившись своей дерзости.{/n} "Не сочтите за нахальство, но выбора у меня не особо... нечасто к нам корабли с припасами заходят, а нам и провизия, и теплые вещи ой как нужны. Если сочтете возможным, мы бы с удовольствием такие грузы выменяли на то, что в корабле отыщем. Такой вот справедливый обмен предлагаем, да". {n}Рета чуть кланяется, прежде чем отойти в сторону.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}Reta falters, as if flustered by her own nerve.{/n} "Please don't take it as insolence, but it's not like I have much choice... It's not often that we get well-stocked ships around here, and we could certainly use more provisions and some warm clothes. If it's something you would be willing to provide, we would gladly barter for it with whatever we can dig up inside this here ship. It's just a respectful offer of fair trade." {n}She bows slightly before stepping aside.{/n}

Если сочтете возможным, мы бы с удовольствием такие грузы выменяли на то, что в корабле отыщем. Такой вот справедливый обмен предлагаем, да". {n}Рета чуть кланяется, прежде чем отойти в сторону.{/n}

It's just a respectful offer of fair trade." {n}She bows slightly before stepping aside.{/n}

It's just a respectful offer of fair trade." {n}She bows slightly before stepping aside.{/n}

It's just a respectful offer of fair trade." {n}She bows slightly before stepping aside.{/n}

languages.text: “大人……”{n}蕾塔犹豫片刻，仿佛被自己的决心吓得不知所措一样。{/n}“请不要认为我在冒犯您，不过我恐怕没什么选择……我们这附近很少能遇到装满货物的舰船。我们需要口粮，还需要暖和的衣服。如果您愿意提供补给的话，我们很愿意用这艘船上挖到的东西进行交换。这只是个公平贸易的提议而已，我尊重您的选择，大人。”{n}她微微鞠了一躬，随后退到一旁。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}Reta falters, as if flustered by her own nerve.{/n} "Please don't take it as insolence, but it's not like I have much choice... It's not often that we get well-stocked ships around here, and we could certainly use more provisions and some warm clothes. If it's something you would be willing to provide, we would gladly barter for it with whatever we can dig up inside this here ship. It's just a respectful offer of fair trade." {n}She bows slightly before stepping aside.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “大人……”{n}蕾塔犹豫片刻，仿佛被自己的决心吓得不知所措一样。{/n}“请不要认为我在冒犯您，不过我恐怕没什么选择……我们这附近很少能遇到装满货物的舰船。我们需要口粮，还需要暖和的衣服。如果您愿意提供补给的话，我们很愿意用这艘船上挖到的东西进行交换。这只是个公平贸易的提议而已，我尊重您的选择，大人。”{n}她微微鞠了一躬，随后退到一旁。{/n}

languages.text: 「陛下…」{n}レタは困ったように狼狽する。{/n}「どうか…無礼者だとお思いでしょうが…他にどうしようもありません…積荷の多い船はこの辺りでは珍しいのです。それに私たちには間違いなく食料と暖かい衣服が足りておりませんので。もし陛下が提供してくださるのであれば、私たちがこの船から掘り起こせるものと引き換えにありがたく頂戴します。敬意を込めた、公正な取引として」{n}彼女は軽く会釈すると脇に下がった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}Reta falters, as if flustered by her own nerve.{/n} "Please don't take it as insolence, but it's not like I have much choice... It's not often that we get well-stocked ships around here, and we could certainly use more provisions and some warm clothes. If it's something you would be willing to provide, we would gladly barter for it with whatever we can dig up inside this here ship. It's just a respectful offer of fair trade." {n}She bows slightly before stepping aside.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下…」{n}レタは困ったように狼狽する。{/n}「どうか…無礼者だとお思いでしょうが…他にどうしようもありません…積荷の多い船はこの辺りでは珍しいのです。それに私たちには間違いなく食料と暖かい衣服が足りておりませんので。もし陛下が提供してくださるのであれば、私たちがこの船から掘り起こせるものと引き換えにありがたく頂戴します。敬意を込めた、公正な取引として」{n}彼女は軽く会釈すると脇に下がった。{/n}

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie... » {n}Réta hésite, comme si elle était troublée par sa propre audace.{/n} « N'y voyez pas de l'insolence, mais je n'ai pas vraiment le choix... Il est rare que nous ayons des vaisseaux bien approvisionnés dans les parages, et nous aurions bien besoin de provisions et de vêtements chauds. Si vous pouvez nous en fournir, nous nous ferons un plaisir de vous le troquer contre ce que nous trouverons dans ce vaisseau. C'est un marché honnête, il me semble. » {n}Elle s'incline légèrement avant de s'écarter.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}Reta falters, as if flustered by her own nerve.{/n} "Please don't take it as insolence, but it's not like I have much choice... It's not often that we get well-stocked ships around here, and we could certainly use more provisions and some warm clothes. If it's something you would be willing to provide, we would gladly barter for it with whatever we can dig up inside this here ship. It's just a respectful offer of fair trade." {n}She bows slightly before stepping aside.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie... » {n}Réta hésite, comme si elle était troublée par sa propre audace.{/n} « N'y voyez pas de l'insolence, mais je n'ai pas vraiment le choix... Il est rare que nous ayons des vaisseaux bien approvisionnés dans les parages, et nous aurions bien besoin de provisions et de vêtements chauds. Si vous pouvez nous en fournir, nous nous ferons un plaisir de vous le troquer contre ce que nous trouverons dans ce vaisseau. C'est un marché honnête, il me semble. » {n}Elle s'incline légèrement avant de s'écarter.{/n}

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}...». {n}Reta titubea, como si se sintiese confundida por su atrevimiento.{/n} «Por favor, no se ofenda, pero no me queda otra... Es raro encontrar naves bien abastecidas, y nos vendría bien conseguir más provisiones y ropa de abrigo. Si no le importa deshacerse de ellas, le entregaríamos cualquier cosa que encontremos en esta nave a cambio. Solo es una oferta de intercambio justo». {n}Realiza una leve reverencia y se aleja.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}Reta falters, as if flustered by her own nerve.{/n} "Please don't take it as insolence, but it's not like I have much choice... It's not often that we get well-stocked ships around here, and we could certainly use more provisions and some warm clothes. If it's something you would be willing to provide, we would gladly barter for it with whatever we can dig up inside this here ship. It's just a respectful offer of fair trade." {n}She bows slightly before stepping aside.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}...». {n}Reta titubea, como si se sintiese confundida por su atrevimiento.{/n} «Por favor, no se ofenda, pero no me queda otra... Es raro encontrar naves bien abastecidas, y nos vendría bien conseguir más provisiones y ropa de abrigo. Si no le importa deshacerse de ellas, le entregaríamos cualquier cosa que encontremos en esta nave a cambio. Solo es una oferta de intercambio justo». {n}Realiza una leve reverencia y se aleja.{/n}

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ..." {n}Reta stockt, als würde ihre eigene Courage sie aus dem Konzept bringen.{/n} "Bitte betrachtet das nicht als Unverfrorenheit, aber ich habe keine große Wahl ... Wir haben hier nicht oft gut bevorratete Schiffe, und wir könnten wirklich mehr Lebensmittel und warme Kleidung gebrauchen. Falls Ihr uns etwas überlassen könnt, tauschen wir gerne gegen alles, was sich in diesem Schiff ausgraben lässt. Dies ist ein respektvolles Angebot zu fairem Handel." {n}Sie verbeugt sich leicht und tritt dann zur Seite.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}Reta falters, as if flustered by her own nerve.{/n} "Please don't take it as insolence, but it's not like I have much choice... It's not often that we get well-stocked ships around here, and we could certainly use more provisions and some warm clothes. If it's something you would be willing to provide, we would gladly barter for it with whatever we can dig up inside this here ship. It's just a respectful offer of fair trade." {n}She bows slightly before stepping aside.{/n}

Wir haben hier nicht oft gut bevorratete Schiffe, und wir könnten wirklich mehr Lebensmittel und warme Kleidung gebrauchen. Falls Ihr uns etwas überlassen könnt, tauschen wir gerne gegen alles, was sich in diesem Schiff ausgraben lässt. Dies ist ein respektvolles Angebot zu fairem Handel." {n}Sie verbeugt sich leicht und tritt dann zur Seite.{/n}

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri..." {n}Reta, gerginlikten heyecana kapılmışçasına bocalıyor.{/n} "Lütfen beni küstah sanmayın ama başka seçeneğim yok... Deposu mal dolu gemiler buralardan pek sık geçmez. Daha fazla erzakla sıcak tutacak kıyafetlere de ihtiyacımız var doğrusu. Bunları bize temin etmeyi kabul ederseniz bu gemiden çıkardığımız bir şeylerle seve seve takas ederiz. Tüm saygımızla dürüst bir ticaret anlaşması teklif ediyoruz." {n}Hafifçe eğilip selam verdikten sonra kenara çekiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}Reta falters, as if flustered by her own nerve.{/n} "Please don't take it as insolence, but it's not like I have much choice... It's not often that we get well-stocked ships around here, and we could certainly use more provisions and some warm clothes. If it's something you would be willing to provide, we would gladly barter for it with whatever we can dig up inside this here ship. It's just a respectful offer of fair trade." {n}She bows slightly before stepping aside.{/n}
